original_title: Three faculties of the Kelaniya Uni to reopen
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The academic activities of three faculties of the University of Kelaniya which were closed will resume on Monday (11).
Accordingly, the Faculty of Commerce and Management Studies, Faculty of Science, and Faculty of Computing and Technology will reopen on Monday (11).
The administration said the Faculty of Humanities and the Faculty of Social Sciences will open on the 18th of December.

Four faculties of the University of Kelaniya were closed on the 4th of December, based on an incident in which a security officer of the university was assaulted and two other security officers were abducted and detained.
